chess.ChessPiece

    • Uses of ChessPiece in chess

      Subclasses of ChessPiece in chess 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Bishop
      This is a SubClass of ChessPiece which represents Bishop from the chess game.
      class  King
      This is the King class extended form the ChessPiece class
      class  Knight
      This is a Knight class which represents the Knight from the Chess game.
      class  pawn
      This is a Pawn class, one of the subclasses of a ChessPiece Class containing two abstract methods.
      class  Queen
      This is the Queen class, a subclass of the abstract class ChessPiece.
      class  Rook
      This is the root class.

      boolean King.check(ChessPiece[][] board)

      static void Chess.CheckMate(ChessPiece king, ChessPiece[][] board, int inCheck)
      This method exhausts all possible options that next player can do to their king in order to avoid checkmate if the count ==8 this means that no matter where the king goes they will lose king has at most 8 possible options
